articles.title: Bitcoin Surges Past $73,000 as ETF Inflows Hit Record High
articles.summary: Bitcoin reached a new all-time high above $73,000 as institutional investors poured record amounts into spot Bitcoin ETFs. The rally marks a significant milestone in cryptocurrency adoption.

articles.title: Institutional Demand Drives Bitcoin to New Heights
articles.summary: Record ETF inflows of $1.2 billion in a single day fuel Bitcoin's momentum as Wall Street embraces digital assets.

articles.title: Bitcoin ETF Flows Shatter Previous Records
articles.summary: BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust alone saw over $500 million in inflows, contributing to Bitcoin's historic rally.

articles.title: Bitcoin Price Discovery Continues as ATH Approaches $75K
articles.summary: Market analysts predict Bitcoin could reach $75,000 by end of month as bullish momentum accelerates with strong institutional support.

articles.title: Bitcoin Dominance Rises to 54% as Altcoins Lag
articles.summary: Bitcoin's market dominance increases as capital flows into BTC ahead of altcoins, signaling strong confidence in the flagship cryptocurrency.

articles.title: Analysts: Bitcoin ETF Approval Marks Turning Point for Crypto
articles.summary: Industry experts say the approval and success of Bitcoin ETFs represents a watershed moment for mainstream cryptocurrency adoption.

articles.title: Trading Volume Spikes as Bitcoin Breaks Through Resistance
articles.summary: Bitcoin trading volumes exceeded $50 billion across major exchanges as the cryptocurrency broke through key resistance levels.

articles.title: Long-Term Bitcoin Holders Remain Steady Despite Price Surge
articles.summary: On-chain data shows long-term Bitcoin holders are not selling despite the price rally, indicating strong conviction in higher prices ahead.

articles.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Adjusts Upward Amid Price Rally
articles.summary: Bitcoin's mining difficulty increased by 3.5% as hashrate reaches new all-time highs following the price surge.

articles.title: Retail Investors Return to Bitcoin as FOMO Intensifies
articles.summary: Cryptocurrency exchanges report surge in new account registrations as retail investors rush to participate in Bitcoin's rally.
